ValidationRule.description: Forces Passcode Entry or Passcode Entry with Name Record as the only available options for Audio Type when RT Audio Service Level is Operator-Assisted Direct and PGi is the Booked With provider.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", $RecordType.Name <> "Webinar Subscription", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "PGi"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Direct"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Passcode Entry")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Operator Assisted Direct events booked with PGi can only have an Audio Type of Passcode Entry. Please make the necessary changes and save the record again.
